supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: 2B350 Chemical manufacturing facilities and equipment, except valves controlled by 2A226, as follows (see List of Items Controlled).

Storage tanks, containers or receivers with a total internal (geometric) volume greater than 0.1 m 3 (100 liters) where all surfaces that come in direct contact with the chemical(s) being processed or contained are made from any of the following materials:
